title: Severed His Bonds (4C319)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Stealth. Skirmish: At sites 1T to 4T, cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit. At any other site, prevent a Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.
Lore:	”'The cord was cut!'”
Rarity:	C
